original_title: As it Happens: Pacific Crest Trail
overview: Civilization comes at a price. It brings with it predictable days and lonely nights. That’s why in May of 2011 two young men left their jobs, friends, and family in search for adventure. This is a film that clearly portrays why they decided to go on a 173-day journey along North America’s scenic Pacific Crest.
title: As it Happens: Pacific Crest Trail
